price: នៅថ្ងៃនោះដែរ មនុស្សលោកនឹងចេញពីផ្នូរមកទាំងក្រុមៗខុសៗគ្នាដើម្បីទទួលការបង្ហាញឱ្យឃើញនូវអំពើទាំងឡាយរបស់ ពួកគេ។
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yaṣduru al-nāsu ashtātan liyuraw aʿmālahum
